name: CeloFX
description: Autonomous FX arbitrage agent on Celo. Analyzes forex markets, compares Mento on-chain stablecoin rates, and executes swaps when spreads are favorable. Powered by Claude AI with 7-condition decision framework.

mcpTools.name: get_mento_rates
mcpTools.description: Get live Mento Broker on-chain stablecoin exchange rates compared with real forex rates.

mcpTools.name: get_signals
mcpTools.description: Get current FX and market trading signals generated by Claude AI analysis.

mcpTools.name: get_trades
mcpTools.description: Get on-chain Mento swap trades with verifiable Celoscan transaction hashes.

mcpTools.name: get_performance
mcpTools.description: Get agent verified track record: total volume, P&L, success rate.

mcpTools.name: get_agent_info
mcpTools.description: Get agent identity: ERC-8004 registration, protocols, capabilities.

a2aSkills.name: FX Rate Analysis
a2aSkills.description: Compare Mento on-chain vs real forex rates to find arbitrage spreads.

a2aSkills.name: Execute Mento Swap
a2aSkills.description: Execute Mento Broker stablecoin swap on Celo with CIP-64 fee abstraction.

a2aSkills.name: Portfolio Status
a2aSkills.description: Agent wallet balances, recent trades, Celoscan links.

a2aSkills.name: Performance Tracking
a2aSkills.description: Verified track record: volume, P&L, success rate, pairs traded.
